body:
> hey @Osmose @mythmon regarding the search/filter combo box, if the user types into the text input, does that filter the dropdown menu? Or is it strictly for filtering rows via text search?

It should filter the dropdown, unless the user hits enter, at which point it should apply a text filter. Or, rather, it should do whatever New Relic's filter dropdown does, because that's what I based it on.
